## Source: amazon-inspector (0736ed9611847ba4c5416cd0bd8ba33bae114769eec8947e7d58c85c3ce100c1)
The package elf-stats-ginger-wreath-646 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (111a6042acaae772dca533487457a6de42e73f9462255ae37229e7e573d8556a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'elf-stats-ginger-wreath-646' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
